attributes.description:
Megane R.S. 280 EDC Lux
Sporty Megane R.S in excellent condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, touch screen radio with bluetooth and USB ports. Multi function steering. Electric windows and mirrors. Reverse camera with sensors to assist with parking. Automatic transmission with various driving modes to suit your preference. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, Roodepoort situated in Wilropark and book this beast for a test drive. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
KIA RIO 1.4 MT TEC PE
Stunning 2022 Rio in amazing condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Electric windows and mirrors. Reverse camera and sensors to assist with parking. Manual transmission that gives a smooth and comfortable drive for you and your family. Great fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, Roodepoort situated in Wilropark and book this beauty for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
